name: yoohoo-guru
description: A comprehensive skill-sharing platform where users exchange skills, discover purpose, and create exponential community impact

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:fast: cd frontend && npm run build:fast && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:backend
